title: How Mohammed Ben Sulayem became FIA president
summary: Mohammed Ben Sulayem's first term as FIA president will come to an end in 2025, and he is expected to seek re-election. But how did he become the first non-European president in the FIA's history?

qa_pairs.question: Who is the first non-European president of the FIA?
When does Mohammed Ben Sulayem's first term as FIA president end?
What is a key role of the FIA in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Regulating the sport and ensuring safety
